hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that:The Prophet said: "Do not let the Bedouins make you change the name of your prayer." Ibn Harmalah added: "Rather it is the 'Isha', but they say the 'Atamah because they bring their camels in for milking at that time (when it is dark)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يُقَالَ صَلاَةُ الْعَتَمَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of Saying The "Atamah Prayer" (Prayer Of Darkness)
